alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 10:19PM CST until February 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Texas County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to Midnight CST Wednesday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy winds and moderate to heavy snowfall may lead to reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Call 844-465-4997 for road information.
